Local store class.

Source: R/class_store_local.R
class_store_local.Rd

R6 class for a local store.

Public fields

Character of length 1, directory for temporary files.

Store constructor.

Usage

class_store_local$new(dir_root = tempfile())

Arguments

dir_root

Character of length 1, file path or prefix where all the files are located.

Method marshal()

Marshal the R6 store object to ship to a worker.

Usage

Returns
